p: Data on the home addresses of reported cases were accessed through the Information System for Notifiable Diseases (SINAN) ( http://sinan.saude.gov.br/). The Center of Surveillance in Environmental Health of Vit√≥ria provided data on House Index (HI) [ 19, 20]. Data on population number, area in square kilometers (km 2) and average income in the districts were obtained from the Census 2010, performed by the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics [ 17].
